wikitext.*:
'''AB'''/'''ABA''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarmë|Root]] related to refusal.

*[[Quenya]]: ''ava- ([[avaquétima]]), [[ava]], [[avanir]], [[apsenë]]''
*[[Telerin]]: ''aba- ([[abapétima]], [[aplat]]), [[aba]]

*[[Adûnaic]]: ''[[bâ]]''

==ABAR==
'''ABAR''' is a related root having to do with a refuser, directly related to the [[Avari]].
*[[Common Eldarin]]: ''[[ábārō]]''
*[[Quenya]]: ''[[Avari]], avar''
*[[Telerin]]: ''[[abar]], [[Abari]]''
*[[Old Noldorin]]: ''[[abóro]]''
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[Afor]]'', ''[[Baravorn]]''
